#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    long long int n,k,m,ans,val=1000000007,temp1,temp2,temp3;
    scanf("%lld %lld %lld",&n,&k,&m);
    if(n==1)
        printf("%lld",m);
    else
    {
    n--;
    switch(k)
    {
    case 1:
        printf("%lld",m);
        break;
    case 2:
        ans=(m+2*m*(n))%val;
        printf("%lld",ans);
        break;
    case 3:
        ans=((2*(((m*n)%val)*(n+1))%val)%val+m)%val;
        printf("%lld",ans);
        break;
    case 4:
        //ans= (((((2*m)%val)*n)%val+((((((2*m)%val)*n)%val)*(n+1)%val)*(2*n+1)%val)/3)%val+1)%val;
        temp1=(((2*m)%val)*n)%val;
        temp2=(((((((2*m)%val)*n)%val)*(n+1)%val)*(2*n+1))%val)/3;
        ans=((temp1+temp2)%val+m)%val;
        printf("%lld",ans);
        break;
    case 5:
        //ans=(m*((2*(((((n*n)%val)*((n+1)*(n+1))%val)%val)/3)+(((8*((n*(n+1))%val))%val)/3) +1))%val)%val;
        temp1=(2*((((n*n)%val)*((((n+1)*(n+1)))%val))%val))%val;
        temp2=((((8*n)%val)*(n+1))%val);
        ans=((m*(((temp1+temp2)%val)/3))%val+m)%val;
        printf("%lld",ans);
    }
    }
    return 0;
}
